video_prompt: Glowing blue-white specks dance and swirl on a winding river. Human-like figures move across a stone bridge and along pathways. Subtle light sources pulsate along riverbanks.
image_prompt: Vertical shot of a highly detailed, whimsical diorama: A deep blue-green river with glowing blue and white specks flows through a lush, mountainous terrain. A detailed stone arch bridge spans the river, with tiny human figures crossing. Craggy mountainsides with green moss and dark green coniferous trees rise on either side. Warm glowing lights illuminate pathways and riverbanks. Intricately rendered trees with textured canopies. Shallow depth of field emphasizes the mid-ground. Rich blues, greens, earthy browns, and warm yellow-orange. Fantastical, enchanting, tranquil, miniature world.
refined_video_prompt: Luminous blue-white specks incessantly dance and swirl, their collective patterns fluidly changing across the river's surface. Humanoid figures steadily traverse over a bridge, their movements continuing along winding pathways. Subtle light sources rhythmically pulsate, casting dynamic glows that shift along the riverbanks.
